description:
In today`s science class, the four girls learn about the `green bug` which is known as euglena. Brimming with scientific curiousity, Jun can`t stop wondering about what that might taste like, and agrees to go have euglena ramen with Koizumi-san. What is that absolutely foreign flavor going to be like???
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ramen à la tomate / Euglène / Longue attente
トマトラーメン / ミドリムシ / 行列
